        <api_name>sn_install_base.getAffectedInstallBaseRecords</api_name>
        <caller_access/>

        <description/>
        <name>getAffectedInstallBaseRecords</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getAffectedInstallBaseRecords(caseSysId) {
    var listOfInstallBaseItems = [];
    var affecteddeployedEnGr = new GlideRecordSecure('sn_install_base_m2m_affected_install_base');
    affecteddeployedEnGr.addQuery('csm_case', caseSysId);
    affecteddeployedEnGr.query();
    while (affecteddeployedEnGr.next()) {
        var id = affecteddeployedEnGr.getValue("install_base_item");
        if (id) {
            listOfInstallBaseItems.push(id.toString());
        }
    }
    return listOfInstallBaseItems;
}]]></script>
